Text: RE Need a Little Help Cc Team Just wanted to let everyone know that Finance Day at MSB went very well from Enrons perspective Mark Bonney Manager RAC and I were on two panels and led a discussion of a short case theme proposed new power plant in US during the Enronsponsored lunch Although Enrons current difficulties were not raised by any student the Finance Club had recommended against bringing the events of last week up they were raised by a professor during the second panel Mark and I did our best to put LJM and other current issues in perspective After lunch one student summed up the apparent sentiments of all She said Enron has stood by Georgetown in this difficult year by interviewing on campus and bringing eight of us back for Super Saturday A lot of fair weather employers are absent this year Enron has stood by Georgetown and Georgetown will stand by Enron That was neat to hear If anyone has the time to stand by Paul please help him out with Wharton and Stern Regards Kirk Original Message From Lebeau Paul Sent Friday October PM To Akan Emel Bergoglio Teseo Canavati Juan Corbacho Sebastian Dayvault Guy Furey Denise Garg Alok Gonzalez Andrea Griffin Scott Ham Roshena Herasimchuk Alyse Howe David Hunter SarahJoy Jennaro Jason Kose Ahmet Malamud Yoselyn McDonald Rob Mitchell Heather Neuner Kirk Patrick Christie Polsky Phil Rosen Michael B Samudio Juan Soldano Louis Sparling Jay Steffes James D Will Nathan Willis Jim Wood Brian Xu Calvin Subject Need a Little Help Hello GT Team I am interviewing at Wharton and Stern NYC next week we are in a bind I am in need of interviewers last minute cancellations Need Wharton Second Rounds Oct th Need One NYU First Rounds Nov Need Two If you are available please let me know Thanks Paul L
